item.title: Retrospective - Surf (Drum & Bass, Lo-fi, Ambient)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Title fits track perfectly. Fantastic vibe throughout. I’m confused by the drum and bass label though.

It’s a bit lengthy - if the second section had something going on that was different melodically, it would help. You probably could cut it in half and it would be just as effective, even more effective maybe.

Those items aside, friggin awesome everything on point!

Read full topic
